subtitleNullable: A Culinary Compilation: The Archana's Kitchen Recipe Dataset Crafted through Web
descriptionNullable:
Dataset Description:

File Information:
- File Name: `indian_food_recipes.csv`
- Format: CSV
- Size: Approximately 18 MB
- Columns: 11
- Date Created: 24/08/2023

Column Descriptions:

| Column Name         | Description                                                                              |
|---------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Name                | The name of the recipe.                                                                 |
| Description         | A brief description of the recipe, highlighting its unique flavors and ingredients.     |
| Cuisine             | The regional or cultural cuisine to which the recipe belongs.                            |
| Course              | The meal course for which the recipe is intended (e.g., Lunch, Dinner, Snack).           |
| Diet                | Dietary preference or suitability of the recipe (e.g., Vegetarian, Non-Vegetarian).      |
| Ingredients Name    | Names of ingredients used in the recipe, separated by commas.                             |
| Ingredients Quantity| Quantity or measurements of ingredients, including specific details.                      |
| Prep Time (in mins) | The time required for preparation in minutes.                                              |
| Cook Time (in mins) | The time required for cooking in minutes.                                                   |
| Instructions        | Detailed instructions for preparing the recipe.                                             |
| Image URL           | URL of an image representing the dish.                                                       |


          This dataset was meticulously collected and structured with the aim of creating a recommendation system for Indian food recipes. The motivation behind creating this dataset was to assist data scientists and culinary enthusiasts in developing innovative recommendation algorithms and exploring the diverse world of Indian cuisine. The dataset's clean and organized structure makes it an ideal resource for conducting research, analysis, and the development of culinary recommendation systems.

Whether you are a data scientist looking to build recommendation models, a food blogger seeking culinary inspiration, or a researcher exploring Indian cuisine trends, this dataset provides a versatile and comprehensive collection of Indian recipes to cater to your needs. Enjoy exploring and analyzing the rich flavors of Indian cooking!
